projects.name: This Website
projects.description: The website you are seeing right now.

tasks.name: Sort Projects Type
tasks.description: Show projects ordered by priority list: internship, school, personal

tasks.name: "Dynamic" Skills
tasks.description: Skills in the Skills section are retrieved from dedicated definition of skills and tech stacks in the projects section. So I don't have to write multiple times.

projects.name: Software Engineer Intern
projects.description: Enhanced an internal administration website made to score companies based on the items issued within the website.

tasks.name: Upgraded Role Based Access Control
tasks.description: Upgraded role based access control from 2 roles into 5 roles with each specialized permissions (e.g. role that only able to issue item but not edit, role that only able to edit, role that can do both).

tasks.name: Developed Item Approval System
tasks.description: Developed two-tier item approval system: "to be approved", and "approved" or "rejected". Only approved items are calculated in the scoring.

tasks.name: Updated The Scoring Calculation
tasks.description: Each item has different score and multiplier based on the category and sub-category. And the multiplier used also different if there is any item in certain categories. Yes, it's complicated!

tasks.name: Refactored Some Part of the Code Base
tasks.description: Maintainability is important! Refactored some of the functions and classes for the better maintainability, such as extracting repeatable logics into functions or putting constant items into list for easier change/scalability.

projects.name: Frontend Developer/Vice Head of Website Division
projects.description: Developed a website made to appreciate the ITB's July 2021 graduates.

tasks.name: Organize Frontend Team
tasks.description: Organized a team of five for the frontend part from developing the UI/UX to develop the website.

tasks.name: Message for The Graduates
tasks.description: Developed a one-direction messaging frontend for the public to give message to the graduates.

tasks.name: Initialized The Frontend Codebase
tasks.description: Set up custom scaffolding for the codebase, although never used React and Typescript before.

projects.name: StatsBot
projects.description: A Discord bot that shows statistics to a Discord server. A contribution to open source project as part of Hacktoberfest 2022.

tasks.name: Show Chess Leaderboard
tasks.description: Develop a feature to show the chess leaderboard by fetching chess.com's API and format the data.

projects.name: Development of Testing Module for Autonomous Tram Simulation Using CARLA Simulator
projects.description: A final project to develop a testing module for an autonomous tram simulation using CARLA Simulator.

tasks.name: Developed Various Testing Scenarios
tasks.description: Developed several testing scenarios such as time scenarios, weather scenarios, traffic scenarios, and specialized scenarios.

tasks.name: Developed Tram Control Agent
tasks.description: Developed a tram control interface on top of CARLA's car control; enables control with only throttle and brake. Developed also an agent that enables receiving control from another computer (using ZeroMQ; in collaboration with another team member).

tasks.name: Developed Scenario Composer
tasks.description: Developed a python program to compose a route-testing-scenarios from a list of scenarios and run the scenario in CARLA ScenarioRunner. Scenarios used and locations are randomized.

projects.name: Smart Room Air Conditioner
projects.description: An Internet-of-Things (IoT) project that monitors and controls the air condition in a room. This system consists of an embedded component, a website, and a machine learning module.

tasks.name: Item Selection Component
tasks.description: Developed a multi-option single-item selection component that hits an API on selection change (Frontend).

tasks.name: Realtime Application State
tasks.description: Developed websocket API to exchange real-time state of the application between the backend and the frontend (Fullstack).

tasks.name: Implemented ML Model
tasks.description: Implemented a TimeSeriesKMeans machine learning model to determine the air quality (Machine Learning). Also integrate the model by saving the trained model to file and using the model in the backend to determine the current condition.

tasks.name: Developed Initial Data Aggregation Pipeline
tasks.description: Developed a data pipeline from MQTT to PySpark aggregator to get current average value of the sensors.

technologies.name: Python
technologies.description: Python is my programming-mother-tongue. Simple project? use python. Complex project? use python.

technologies.name: C#
technologies.description: Is this Java or C#? I don't know. I use C# for my internship project.

technologies.name: Git

technologies.name: Docker

technologies.name: Linux
